mapper.select:
select po.order_num, m.name, po.order_total_price, to_char(po.order_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as order_date, po.order_status, po.exist_addr_flag from product_order po, member m where po.id=m.id and po.order_status in ('0')
and m.name like '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
order by po.order_num desc
select od.order_cnt, od.order_price, p.thum, p.prd_name, p.prd_price, p.prd_discount from order_detail od, product p where od.order_num=#{orderNum} and od.prd_num=p.prd_num
select name, phone, email, zipcode, addr, de_addr, deli_req, order_date, order_num from member m, product_order po where po.order_num=#{orderNum} and m.id=po.id
